name: Witch on the run!
description:
You are a witch that is on the run from the king! You need to use you magic powers (cards) to escape or kill the knights.

Made in 3 days for the ScoreSpace Jam. This fits the theme

How to play:

  • Press the move button in the bottom right to choose move spot then click around the player to move
  • Press damage to hurt the enemies
  • Press special to use your special abilities

*GAME WILL STOP RESPONDING TO MAKE THE MAP WHEN YOU CLICK PLAY IF YOU WAIT UNTIL ITS OVER (TAKES ABOUT A MINUTE) YOU CAN PLAY THE GAME*

Code by PepperBoi

Art by TrueAuraCoral

Music is Here: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
